knimeNode.name: Workflow Output
knimeNode.shortDescription: Sends back data to an external KNIME workflow. For use in workflows that are called from other workflows.

fullDescription.intro: Sends a table or any other port object to a KNIME workflow that calls this workflow using the Subworkflow node.

ports.inPort: Output provided by this workflow to a workflow calling this workflow, e.g, using the Call Workflow node. The port can be configured to match the type of data that is to be received by the calling workflow.
